changelog:
- kernel: Upstream to 4.9.178 (beryllium, vince, tissot)
- Merge CAF tag LA.UM.7.3.r1-07800-sdm845.0
- Random BoostFramework fixes and tweaks
- Settings: display fstype for mounted volumes
- Dialer: Cleanups and add autorecord feature
- Dialer: Fix crash on call end
- Launcher3: Rounded hexagons icons
- LiveDisplay: Change night/day mode transition behavior
- LiveDisplay: Use Google's algorithm to convert color temperature to RGB
- Added Compass tile
- Switch to Gboard GO
- Add support to screenshot editor (Markup)
- PoorManThemes: Messages: fix conversation list select menu icons color
- Added ANIMATION_DURATION option
- Added ANIMATION_NO_OVERRIDE option
- Fixed auto-brightness first screen update
- Update CarrierConfig overlays from OSS 9
- Update APNs list
- Other fixes and system optimizations
